channel.title: Process on Minute Media Tech and Product Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Process on Minute Media Tech and Product Blog

item.title: Design Review - Not Another Bulls***t Meeting
item.description: Design Review meetings, or as we at Minute Media like to call them, Product Reviews, are some of the best tools you can use to increase transparency and relations among teams, and of course, the quality of the product.

item.title: DIY: Creating a Great Relationship Between Dev & Design
item.description: A successful relationship between the dev & design teams is key to achieving a good product. Unfortunately in most companies, this is not the case.

item.title: How Using a Monorepo is Helping Us Work Better
item.description: Similar to many other mature startups moving towards their growth stage, Minute Media had to rebuild some of its infrastructure. Our initial infrastructure was a Monolithic application in Ruby on Rails, but we realized we needed to explore other options as our company and team grew.
